name: SPITEFUL HEART
description:
You must conquest...

Conquest this spiteful heart!!. You must give it gifts, but take care, it’ doesn’t like everything. If you give it undesired gifts, it will gets angry. To conquest it you must learnmits likes. Do it before your are run out of selft confident.

Press Left or Right to go around the heart.

Press Up and Down to get closer or far away.

Catch the gifts that are floating and throw them to the heart pressing the Space bar or fire.
Don’t forget to avoid the negative energy or you will loose your selft confident.

ONCE YOU HAVE ENDED, If you want to play again, you must restart the game.
It is just a minor problem.

GOOD LUCK!!!
